attributes.action: Give the British people an opportunity to express an opinion on whether Trident should be replaced by creating and publicising an official ePetition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There will doubtless be many ePetitions created on this subject and consequently no way to gauge public opinion. 
The creation of an official ePetition on the subject with appropriate publicity will be an opportunity for the government to break new ground in consulting the British people on a decision which will have an impact on government spending, international relations and defence priorities for many years.

rejection.details: Feedback and suggestions should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
